result.name: hydrological-sections-for-england-scotland-and-wales-with-associated-river-catchment-2023-water
result.notes:
This dataset consists of hydrologically defined sections (polygons) for the 
whole of Great Britain including river channels and coastal areas up to the 
mean high water line for England and Wales. Each section has the following 
attributes:


-   The devolved administration(s) the section is within
-   The area of the section that is contained within the devolved 
    administration(s)
-   The regional administration (from the Ordnance Survey Boundary Line) that 
    the majority of the section is within
-   The river catchment that the section is within. These are the existing 
    Fish Health Inspectorate (FHI) catchment boundaries, new England and Wales 
    catchments to ensure complete coverage of England and Wales, and the 
    Scottish Environmental Protection Agency (SEPA) catchments.
-   The waterbody river basin district ID and waterbody ID for England and 
    Wales from the Water Framework Directive.

There are 2 versions of this dataset in a geographical coordinate reference 
system (CRS) (EPSG 4236 - WGS84) see `Hydrological sections for England, 
Scotland and Wales with associated river catchment 2023, Water Framework 
Directive (WFD) waterbody and regional information (WGS84)`_* *and this 
dataset in a projected CRS BNG (EPSG 27700).


.. _`hydrological sections for england, scotland and wales with associated river catchment 2023, water framework directive (wfd) waterbody and regional information (wgs84)`:
    https://data.cefas.co.uk/view/21968
